Must be enrolled in course type {04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 07G, 07PG} owned by {50000567}

description: This unit focuses on issues relating to psychiatry, psychology and law. Topics covered will include the involvement of psychiatrists and psychologists in the legal system, such as: assessment of mental health conditions and decision-making capacity for the purposes of adult guardianship and mental health legislation;  assessments for the purposes of law relating to unfitness to stand trial,   automatism, the defence of mental impairment and sentencing; risk assessments for the purposes of serious sex offender legislation; expert evidence and legal aspects of privacy and confidentiality in mental health care.
